about_the_game:
Kotori has longed to be a magical girl for most of her life. With her animal familiar Brie, she moves to the vibrant Larimar City in the hopes of joining a magical girl guild. It's a competitive field though, and the pair may find they have to take some risks to find the employment they're looking for.

In this RPG and Visual Novel hybrid, you'll battle cute enemies alongside a colorful cast of characters, managing their energy (both physical and magical) to get the job done.

Story

Magical girls are a specific class of worker that has spent years mastering the drawing of magic from their planet’s five moons. They use this magic to fight creatures of darkness that congregate in the no-man's-land between cities. Kotori Mori, a plucky new magical girl, hopes to find a job in one of the famous guilds of Larimar City. During a test for a guild, she and Brie Butternuggets (her animal familiar and friend) will meet Kaida Hikari and Gigi, who are on a mission of their own for the Songbird Guild.

Characters

Kotori is your typical anime protagonist. She’s strong, sometimes reckless, and has deep ambitions that drive her every move. Her low defense and her susceptibility to being stunned make her a bit squishy, but keep her well protected and her high attack and crit stats will give your team the firepower it needs.

Genteel, at times to the point of being stiff, Kaida is the most put together of the Songbird members. With heavy defense and very high status resist, she’s a tank, but also hits like a wet noodle. More complex magical abilities will need to be used sparingly, but her ability to quickly heal stamina makes her a good long-game character.

Brie is quiet and mellow, but not necessarily shy, just laid back. As the guild’s primary healer, he’s very important in the field, so make sure to protect him! While a pretty tanky character, he is weak to burns.

Gigi is a nerd on many topics, including history, magic, and technology. Once she starts talking about a subject she’s interested in, it’s hard to get her to stop. She has heavy burn resist, but low defense and is very weak to poison.

And last but not least, Ai is Kaida's crazy older sister. Gifted with incredible magical power, but lacking the same power of foresight, Ai hits harder than anyone with crazy status effects to boot. Just try not to damage your own team too much in the process.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10 or Newer
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: The Songbird Guild is a Yuri RPG/Visual Novel hybrid about magical girls falling in love. Investigate the secrets of a corrupt fantasy world and fight creepy (yet somehow adorable?) monsters in turn-based battles, all to pay the bills in this world where being a magical girl is a regular 9-5 job.
